Articles.Content:
I was just going through my iPhone photos and saw the below picture of a sunset.

First thought: Wrong folder, I haven't landed on Eve in 0.22!
Yesterday I found myself saying "needs moar boosters" or "needs moar struts" in my head each time I had a problem
I read a book mentioning Hohmann transfers and immediately thought KSP
R/C plane's wing rips off mid-flight and instantly looses horizontal speed (somehow) and falls straight down. "The Kraken!"

Well... my friend has a little glass squid, and I'm like, "Nice Kraken", and he's like "Wha-" And I'm like, "Oops. I mean squid..."

What plane? Don't mean to detract from the thread but... http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60978-RC-Planes-And-Stuff
